title: Treehouse Cyclery Kickstarter
content:
Treehouse Cyclery is moving to Boulder, Colorado and to help it with its next phase in business evolution, it is seeking $15,000 from its community. There’s a Kickstarter to help Alyssa and Colby out. Everything the two raise will go directly back into the shop, events and programming, rent, bills, and shop improvements after out move to Boulder.

Treehouse recognizes this is a large ask and only a fraction of what the small IBD needs to really get things going. While this funding will help the new shop launch, it only covers a portion of what’s needed to fully bring our vision to life. At the Kickstarter, you’ll find its stretch goals, which outline what we can accomplish with additional support.

The post Treehouse Cyclery Kickstarter appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
